textAfterTable: Showing 5 results of 5 Flat | Threaded [Freeorion-programmers] SF.net SVN: freeorion:[4004] trunk/FreeOrion/UI From: <geoffthemedio@us...> - 2011-06-20 20:08:03 Revision: 4004 http://freeorion.svn.sourceforge.net/freeorion/revision/?rev=4004&view=rev Author: geoffthemedio Date: 2011-06-20 20:07:56 +0000 (Mon, 20 Jun 2011) Log Message: ----------- Modified RotatingPlanetControl and MapWnd to delete their scanline shader programs when they are destroyed and sanitized respectively. The former uses a static instance counter to do this. This is done so that the scanline shader program is destroyed when ending a game / returning to the main menu, and not some time later when cleaning up after execution, as previously this was happening after GL and the logger were shut down, leading to a pointless crash message on Windows in some cases after an otherwise error-free exit of the program.
